name: Parryship
description:
Premise:

You are tossed in a spaceship in the middle of an arena with low resources and a crummy spaceship. This spaceship can however deflect enemy projectiles, destroy asteroids containing resources and shoot rockets!

Each round you have an objective that you must complete to progress. These objectives range from killing all enemies to collecting energy pellets from the arena. After completing the objective you gain money to buy upgrades for you ship.

Controls:

Gamepad and Keyboard+Mouse supported. Gamepad recommended.

Keyboard+mouse:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

LMB for rockets

RMB for zoom out

Q for rock burner

Spacebar for deflection

ESC for pause menu

Gamepad:

Left stick to move

Right stick to aim

R1 for full view

L1 for deflect

R2 for rockets

L2 for rock burner

Options for pause menu

Additional info:

A simple game made in Unity. Models made in Blender and GIMP was used for UI image manipulation.

Made by Mikael Gustafsson

All sounds from Zapsplat.com
